mapper.select: SELECT refpath FROM ref r INNER JOIN lecture l ON r.lid = l.lid WHERE l.lid = #{lid}

SELECT r.rid as rid , r.uid as uid , r.lid as lid , r.content as content , r.writedate , u.role as urole FROM user u INNER JOIN purchase p ON u.uid = p.uid INNER JOIN reply r ON p.uid = r.uid WHERE r.lid = #{lid} ORDER BY r.writedate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(uid, lid, content, writedate) VALUES(#{uid}, #{lid}, #{content}, DATE(NOW()))
INSERT INTO video(lid, title, videopath) VALUES(#{lid}, #{title}, #{videopath});
